paragraphs: Imagine my surprise when I received a message from Auberic Dufont. He is very anxious to receive his entry token for the next scheduled event. If I recall correctly, and of course I do, you were tasked with making sure it was delivered to him with all appropriate pomp. He is a very wealthy addition to our clientele and deserves the utmost attention.

If you cannot handle both a simple task as well as being able to recruit suitable candidates for the next event, do let me know. I am sure there are others who can do either or both tasks ably enough.
